text: [Music]
the dedicated interview period is a
unique offering that we have at the
Harvard Business School where you as an
organization can elect to have students
apply to your
organization you select who you want to
see and then the students are able to
interview with you with no
distractions there are many advantages
to the dedicated interview period or dip
as we tend to call it here when I think
about it from the organization's
perspective everything's taken care of
for you so you have the ability to
select your students and then show up
for interviews is the next big step we
have breakfast and lunch catered by the
Double Tree
Hotel and from the students perspective
there are no distractions they don't
have class they don't need to prepare
for cases they are 100% in the mindset
of interviewing for and hopefully
getting offers from organizations for
either internship or full-time
opportunities in addition to the
dedicated interview period we offer a
variety of ways for you to interview on
campus as well as opportunities to
interview our students on the west coast
in the Bay Area
[Music]
